mapper.select: SELECT coach_no,coach_name,coach_detail,coach_poster,poster,subject,content,price,review_avg,num FROM (SELECT coach_no,coach_name,coach_detail,coach_poster,poster,subject,content,price,review_avg,rownum as num FROM (SELECT coach_no,coach_name,coach_detail,coach_poster,poster,subject,content,price,review_avg FROM coach_info WHERE cate_no=#{cateno})) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT coach_no,month,time,place,reserve_check,schedule_no,num FROM (SELECT coach_no,month,time,place,reserve_check,schedule_no,rownum as num FROM (SELECT coach_no,month,time,place,reserve_check,schedule_no FROM coach_schedule)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT coach_no,coach_qna_no,writer,subject,content,hit,pwd,regdate,num FROM (SELECT coach_no,coach_qna_no,writer,subject,content,hit,pwd,regdate,rownum as num FROM coach_no,coach_qna_no,writer,subject,content,hit,pwd,regdate FROM coach_qna)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(reserve_no)+1,1) as reserve_no FROM coach_reserve
INSERT INTO coach_reserve VALUES( #{coach_no}, #{schedule_no}, #{id}, #{reserve_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT coach_no,coach_qna_no,subject,content,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,id,name,form,hit,group_id,group_tab FROM coach_qna WHERE coach_no=#{coach_no} ORDER BY group_id asc,group_tab asc
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(coach_qna_no)+1,1) as coach_qna_no FROM coach_qna
INSERT INTO coach_qna(coach_qna_no,coach_no,id,name,form,subject,content,regdate,group_id,hit,group_tab) VALUES( #{coach_qna_no}, #{coach_no}, #{id}, #{name}, #{form}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1,1) FROM coach_qna), 0, 0 )

SELECT NVL(MAX(coach_qna_no)+1,1) as coach_qna_no FROM coach_qna
